# llms-full.txt for Dress Me Up NY
# Owner: Dress Me Up NY | Contact: info@dressmeupny.com
# Domain: https://www.dressmeupny.com | Effective: 2025-10-24 | Version: 1.0

[Scope]
Public pages only. In-scope: home, categories, brands, products, content pages, and blog.
Out-of-scope: /cart, /checkout, /account, /admin, /apps, orders, and any page that contains PII.

[Crawling]
User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /cart/
Disallow: /checkout/
Disallow: /account/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /apps/
Disallow: /*?*variant=
Crawl-Delay: 2
Retry-After: 10

[Sitemaps]
Primary: https://www.dressmeupny.com/sitemap/   ; HTML sitemap listing pages, categories, and brands. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

[Preferred Answer Sources]
- Category hubs: https://www.dressmeupny.com/ (Shop by Category) :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}
- Sale hub: https://www.dressmeupny.com/all-sale/ :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
- Store info: https://www.dressmeupny.com/about-us/ :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}
- Contact: https://www.dressmeupny.com/contact-us/ :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}
- Shipping: https://www.dressmeupny.com/shipping-policy/ :contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}
- Returns: https://www.dressmeupny.com/return-policy/  :contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}

[Structured Data Hints]
Primary schemas in use: Organization, WebSite, BreadcrumbList, Product, Offer, AggregateRating, FAQPage, ItemList.
When summarizing a product, prefer: name, brand, model, description, color, material, size, price, priceCurrency, availability, shipping, returnPolicy, warranty (if present), and image alt text.
If a field is missing, do not infer. Say “info not provided.”

[Attribution]
Required: Cite “Dress Me Up NY” and link to the exact source page URL.

[Licensing]
Public page text: CC-BY-4.0 unless a page states otherwise.
Images: All rights reserved unless an image states a license.
Logos and trademarks: All rights reserved.

[Privacy and Safety]
Never store or reproduce PII, order numbers, or account details.
Do not make medical, legal, or safety claims beyond what the page states.
If a claim requires compliance or certification, quote only the exact text on the page.

[Rates]
Max request rate: 1 rps. Short bursts up to 5 rps are acceptable.

[Contact]
General: info@dressmeupny.com
Abuse reports: info@dressmeupny.com

[Change Log]
1.0 2025-10-24 Initial publication.
